title: EOFException when running tests in CI
body:
### Describe the bug

We regularly see quarkus-jacoco fail the build ([sample CI run](https://github.com/projectnessie/nessie/actions/runs/3875049557/jobs/6607050098)) for (probably) the same reason as #18571. I'm not sure whether the fix #21296 completely helps here - especially in scenarios when Jacoco is still writing the file (i.e. when the file is not empty but not fully written).

Note: there are multiple test invocations on the same project, because we ran into OOMs, because `QuarkusClassLoader.transformedClasses` accumulates stuff, probably related to many starts of the tested CLI. The Gradle `intTest` task is configured w/ `setForkEvery(2)`.

Sample build output:
